mapper.select:
{ call RIclientes( #{pi_correo, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{pi_password, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{pi_idPais, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{pi_idEstado, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{pi_idCiudad, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{pi_telefono, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{pi_usuarioModifico, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{err_num, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=INTEGER, mode=OUT}, #{err_msg, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String, mode=OUT}
) }

{ call RUusuarioDisp( #{pi_id, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{pi_idUsuario, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{pi_numeroSerie, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{pi_aliasDisp, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{pi_tiempoActualizacion, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{pi_idStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{pi_serieChip, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{pi_usuarioModifico, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{err_num, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=INTEGER, mode=OUT}, #{err_msg, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String, mode=OUT} ) }

{ call RUcatChips( #{pi_numeroSerie, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{pi_descripcion, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{pi_idTelefonica, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{pi_fechaFabricacion, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{pi_fechaRegistro, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{pi_numeroTelefonico, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{pi_idStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{pi_usuarioModifico, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{err_num, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=INTEGER, mode=OUT}, #{err_msg, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String, mode=OUT} ) }
